mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diarydate, history, photoid, email, foodname) VALUES(sysdate(), #{history}, #{photoid}, #{email}, #{foodname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM diary d INNER JOIN photos p ON d.PHOTOID = p.PHOTOID INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON d.FOODNAME = f.FOODNAME WHERE email = #{email} AND diarydate = curdate() ORDER BY d.datano DESC

SELECT d.DIARYDATE diarydate, round(sum(f.CALORIES)) calsum, round(sum(f.CARBOHYDRATES)) carbsum, round(sum(f.PROTEINS)) proteinsum, round(sum(f.FATS)) fatsum FROM diary d INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON f.FOODNAME = d.FOODNAME WHERE d.EMAIL = #{email} GROUP BY d.DIARYDATE ORDER BY d.DIARYDATE DESC LIMIT 5;
